about.author: Tim Stephenson
about.name: Submit a case study
about.title: Do you have a case study to share with others?
about.instructions: If you complete the form below we add it to the library for others to use too. Please note: We do review these submissions by hand so it may take us a few days to get back to you.

questionsTitle: Please tell us about your case study

questions.name: name
questions.hint: A short, high-impact headline for your case study
questions.label: Headline

questions.name: link
questions.hint: A link to the source or reference of your case study
questions.label: Link

questions.name: paywall
questions.hint: Tick if the link is behind a paywall
questions.label: Paywall?

questions.name: featuredImage
questions.hint: Link to a high-definition image that supports or illustrates your case study
questions.label: Featured image

questions.name: description
questions.hint: The key information summarising your case study, no need to duplicate all of the content of the link!
questions.label: Description

questions.hint: Tell us what type of organisation the case study is from. For example: Acute Trust, CCG, GP practice, Ambulance Trust etc.
questions.label: Organisation type
questions.name: orgType

questions.hint: The name of the organisation where the case study took place
questions.label: Organisation name
questions.name: orgName

questions.hint: The STP location the case study took place in. See https://www.england.nhs.uk/systemchange/view-stps/.
questions.label: Geography
questions.name: geography

questions.hint: What was the issue being addressed?
questions.label: Issue
questions.name: issue

questions.hint: What were the lessons learned / success factors?
questions.label: Lessons learned
questions.name: lessons

questions.hint: How can we scale up the project to create more benefits?
questions.label: Scaling up
questions.name: scaling

submit.text: Thanks for your submission, we will get back to you in the next few days.
submit.title: That's it!
